name: Without Miles
description:
Miles and Marble.

A kitten with a puppy.

They play with each other all day but...

Let's just say, things happen.



It's a 2D side scroller puzzle platformer where the focus is on the story and audio visual experience.

Credits - Team Gryffindors
Murk Bhutto
Arisha Khan
Ali Hamza
Bilal A. Cheema

Developed for Epiphany's Developers Game Jam. Thank you for the amazing game jam, Team Epiphany.

Theme was "Cute and Colorful".
